content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions, but I can tell you that it seems like pursuing multiple careers is becoming more common nowadays. With the advent of technology, it has become easier to switch careers, retrain, and work remotely. Additionally, many people are starting to prioritize personal fulfillment over traditional career paths, leading them to explore various fields that align with their interests and passions. That being said, there are still many challenges associated with pursuing multiple careers, and it is not a suitable option for everyone.
